channel.title: Control Origins - Business Technology Solutions
channel.description: Control Origins empowers organizations with innovative technology solutions for regulatory compliance, strategic sourcing, and business transformation using Microsoft Azure, ASP.NET, and modern cloud technologies.

item.title: Control Origins - Innovative Business Technology Solutions
item.description: Unleash the power of control for your business with our comprehensive technology solutions including regulatory compliance, strategic sourcing, portfolio analysis, and financial analysis.

item.title: Mark Hazleton - Control Origins Co-Founder & Technology Expert
item.description: Meet Mark Hazleton, Control Origins co-founder with expertise in Microsoft Azure, ASP.NET, DevOps, and enterprise solution delivery. Passionate about making technology work for business.

item.title: Control Origins Terms of Service
item.description: Terms of service and legal information for Control Origins technology solutions and services.
